remarks: The adjoint function.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ajfval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ajfval.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
ajfval.3 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ajfval.4 $e |- Q = ( .iOLD ` W ) $.
ajfval.5 $e |- A = ( U adj W ) $.
ajfval $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> A = { <. t , s >. | ( t : X --> Y /\ s : Y --> X /\ A. x e. X A. y e. Y ( ( t ` x ) Q y ) = ( x P ( s ` y ) ) ) } ) $.
$d U s t x y $.
$d W s t x y $.
$d X s t x $.
$d Y s t y $.
